ngiemboon: Mèŋ n daa mbab shÿóo pfɛ́ɛ.
en: I have never eaten elephant meat.

ngiemboon: A labté káŋ ńnéŋ shúm léjÿó tsoló.
en: He washed the plate halfway and put the food in it.

ngiemboon: Múɔ wɔɔn lábte lépí shúm tá we.
en: This child has the ability to take his father's things.
mix of ground grilled maize and peanuts
